com.facebook.buck.core.build.distributed.synchronization

Interface RemoteBuildRuleCompletionWaiter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NoOpRemoteBuildRuleCompletionWaiter, RemoteBuildRuleSynchronizer

    public interface RemoteBuildRuleCompletionWaiter
    Used by a local build to wait for remote completion of build rules (if there is a remote build)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean shouldWaitForRemoteCompletionOfBuildRule(String buildTarget)
      Local Buck builds will never wait for remote completion of rule before building locally.
      com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<CacheResult> waitForBuildRuleToAppearInCache(BuildRule buildRule, Supplier<com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<CacheResult>> cacheCheck)
      When performing a remote/distributed build, Future will get set once the given build target has finished building remotely and the cacheCheck no longer returns a miss (tested with a limited number of backoffs).
      com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<Boolean> waitForMostBuildRulesToFinishRemotely() 

    • Method Detail

      • shouldWaitForRemoteCompletionOfBuildRule

        boolean shouldWaitForRemoteCompletionOfBuildRule(String buildTarget)
        Local Buck builds will never wait for remote completion of rule before building locally. Stampede builds always wait if local_mode = WAIT_FOR_REMOTE, and will also wait if set to false but the build rule has already started building remotely.
        Parameters:
        buildTarget -
        Returns:

      • waitForBuildRuleToAppearInCache

        com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<CacheResult> waitForBuildRuleToAppearInCache(BuildRule buildRule,
                                                                                                Supplier<com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<CacheResult>> cacheCheck)
        When performing a remote/distributed build, Future will get set once the given build target has finished building remotely and the cacheCheck no longer returns a miss (tested with a limited number of backoffs). For a non-remote build build, this operation is a no-op and the Future will return immediately.
        Returns:
        Future with result supplied by final cacheCheck (further chaining with direct executor will use the thread that finished the execution of cacheCheck) or future with CacheResult.ignored() if the operation is a no-op.

      • waitForMostBuildRulesToFinishRemotely

        com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<Boolean> waitForMostBuildRulesToFinishRemotely()
        Returns:
        Future that will complete when most build rules have finished remotely. Value indicates whether most rules finished successfully or in a failure.
